sile.mr: Akar dapanim: E magɨrɨ akar me mɨgeim abɨghrarightɨ, me uan akar mɨngaribagh foghan kogh egh uariv kɨman kogham.
sile.s1: Akar kam, a Faraghavɨram Otivizir Bizibar Akɨnafarim, o Jenesis, an aven iti.

twocol.p: Fomɨra nguazimɨn gumazamiziba bar akar vamɨra ikia egha mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevir vabaram ami. Egha me aruem anadi naghɨn ikegha, puram arua ghua iza Babilonɨn nguazir zarimɨn apia.

Egha me uarira uariv gei, “Aria, ia izɨ, e bar moghɨra nguazitaba inigh egh da tueghtɨ da brikbar mɨn otivika.” Egha me dɨpenibar ingaramin brikbagh ami. Egha me brighɨn kabagh amizɨ da uarir isavsuighamin koltaba uaghan iti. Egha me ghaze, “E datɨrɨghɨn uari uaribagh nguibar ekiatamɨn ingaram, egh an aven tauan bar ruaritam asam, eghtɨ an ruarim mangɨ overiamɨn suiragham. Egh kamaghɨn, e uari abɨgh mang tintinibar nguazimɨn nguibar igharazibar ikian kogham. E kamaghɨn damutu, gumazamiziba bar ziar bar ekiam e danɨngam.”

Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, nguibar ekiar kam ko tauan me an aven ingarizimɨn ganasa izaghiri. Egha uan Nguibamɨn ikia ghaze, “Gumazamizir kaba me akar vamɨram mɨgɨa egha uari inigha nɨghnɨzir vamɨra iti. Egha nguibar dafar kamɨn ingari. Me kamaghɨn uan nɨghnɨzimɨn gɨn mangɨ, bizir avɨribar amuam. Kamagh amizɨ e ua magɨrɨ akar me mɨgeim abɨghrarightɨ, me uan akar mɨngaribagh foghan kogh egh uariv kɨman kogham.”

Egha Ikiavɨra Itir God me gamizɨ, me tintinibar nguaziba bar adar ghue. Egha nguibar ekiar kam uam a ingari puvatɨ. Dughiar kam, Ikiavɨra Itir God gumazamizir kabar akar me mɨgeiba abɨagharɨki, ezɨ me tintinibar nguazimɨn danganiba bar adar ghue. Kamaghɨn me nguibar ekiar kam dɨbora ghaze, “Babel.”
